Aragón López, José Arturo
Martínez de la Vega Celorio, Andrea
Granados Gracia, Martín
Soria Céspedes, Danny Rolando
Bargalló Rocha, Enrique
de la Rosa Abaroa, Marco Antonio
metadata.dc:description: Malignant paragangliomas are rare, but may occur especially in patients with familial forms of the disease. We present the case of a 23 year old woman diagnosed with bilateral carotid paraganglioma with distant and local metastases, associated to a family history of paraganglioma and we present a literature review.
metadata.dc:subject: Tumor glomus
Glomus tumor
Paraganglioma
Tumor de cuerpo carotídeo
Paragangliomas
Carotid body tumor
metadata.dc:title: Malignant paraganglioma (multiple, multicentric and metastatic) in a female patient with family history of paraganglioma.
